name: AI-Powered Sanitization Monitoring
desc: Verifies wiping and sanitizer-spray actions and gives real-time feedback (Green Tick / Red Alert).

name: Agricultural Marketplace (AgriConnect)
desc: Online marketplace connecting farmers, suppliers, and buyers. Secure payments and improved product visibility.

name: Mentor Matrix
desc: Matches mentors and mentees based on skills and goals; increased pairing accuracy and engagement.
